title: Hello
body:
Hi !

Today i received this message "Do you want free RP?"
And he written this link  EDITED FOR PLAYER SAFETY

PRINT SCREEN : 
EDITED FOR PLAYER SAFETY

Sorry but im from ro and i don t speak english to much

Please do something :(

replies.body:
Hmmmmmm "free RP" sounds pretty sketchy to me as well. I'd stay away from any third-party or non-official ways of buying RP as you're never sure who could be on the other end or what their intentions are. I'd also be sure to block that person, and only add trusted friends so you aren't misled again!

If you logged into that website and think there might already be damage, please reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can take a look and help keep your account safe.
